443b1(brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na/ ci nas kyang bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de chu ma rnyed nas sems mi
443b2(brgyad stong pa): dga' zhing sdug bsngal te yid mi bde bar gyur cing sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / gang gis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de'ang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir gang gis
443b3(brgyad stong pa): sa phyogs der chag chag 'debs pa'i chu de thams cad kyang mi snang ba nyid du byas pas kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du/ ma la bdag

443b7(brgyad stong pa): yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ni/ ma yin te/ 'dod pa de lta bu'i chos can la zhig pa yin no/ /snyam du bsams so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de ltar bsams

444a2(brgyad stong pa): d pa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi khrag

446b3(brgyad stong pa): skyes par gyur to/ /chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom sems

446b6(brgyad stong pa): 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
446b7(brgyad stong pa): nam mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
447a1(brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du chu'i khams
447a2(brgyad stong pa): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par shes pa'i
447a3(brgyad stong pa): khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
447a4(brgyad stong pa): dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes
447a5(brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de lta bu la
447a6(brgyad stong pa): sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu rab tu thob par gyur to/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u

447b1(brgyad stong pa): cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten stong
447b2(brgyad stong pa): g sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su
447b3(brgyad stong pa): bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas te tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong
447b4(brgyad stong pa): ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems
447b5(brgyad stong pa): dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas te tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no/ /de mang du thos pa bsam gyis
447b6(brgyad stong pa): mi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho dang ldan par gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du'ang nam yang sangs rgyas dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /skye ba thams cad du yang gang dang gang du
447b7(brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu skyes te tha na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /des mi khom
448a1(brgyad stong pa): pa thams cad ni/ spangs/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni/ bsgrubs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
448a2(brgyad stong pa): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes

449a1(brgyad stong pa): na ji srid du rab tu spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par

449b6(brgyad stong pa): bzang pos yul dbus kyi 'grel pa la gtugs nas bcos shing zhus te gtan la phabs/ yang slad kyis skyid smad mnye thang na mo cher paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba 'brom

450a1(brgyad stong pa): mdo gsum la gtugs nas lan gnyis gtan la phabs/ slad kyis yang lo tsA ba de nyid kyis bshad pa mdzad cing phran tshegs kyang gtan la phabs/
